searchDocs.title: Ingredients​
searchDocs.content: 1 1/2 oz silver tequila1 oz orange liqueur (Cointreau, Triple Sec, or Marnier)3/4 oz freshly-squeezed lime juice1/2 oz simple syrup (or to taste)icelime wedge and coarse salt/sugar for rimming the glass if desired

searchDocs.title: Instructions​
searchDocs.content: Combine liquids into shakerFill shaker with iceShake for 10-15 secondsRub lime wedge around cup rimPut cup rim in coarse salt/sugarPour into cup while straining out ice (can leave some ice in if desired)Enjoy!  Resources  Recipe inspired by: https://www.gimmesomeoven.com/margarita-recipe/
